channel.title: How to make holyforce into a emote
channel.description: i got the holyforce command done but i want to make it into an emote tab for admins and up can some one help

item.title: How to make holyforce into a emote
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

What the hell is this “holyforce” crap?
Just make it do the emote when you click a button. That was simple, wasn’t it?

Read full topic
